summary: Shakes is good at his job as party clown - when he's sober and shows up. Five druggy clowns frame him for the murder of his boss.
cast: Bobcat Goldthwait|Julie Brown|Bruce Baum|Steve Bean|Blake Clark|Eliza Coyle|Paul Dooley|Gerald F. keywords: clown|party|murder|mime|written and directed by cast member
title: Shakes
